articles.author: Kamran Haider, Sudhi Ranjan Sen
articles.title: Pakistan Starts Military Action After India Missile Strikes - Bloomberg
articles.description: Pakistan’s army said it struck several Indian military sites early Saturday in retaliation for India’s missile strikes on airbases, a significant escalation in the conflict between the two nuclear-armed neighbors.
